attributes.comment:
I have been following the news on immigration and I think that the increase is well
worth deserved in coming. I think that with the increase the agency can hire more
people to process such a huge load the the agency already has. I have called
customer service on various occasions to ask for help with questions and I was
very satisfied with the help. The people in customer service were gracious and
went way beyond their way to help out. I think that you are doing a great job!
With all the terrorism going on, it is understanding that all the work you do is for
the safety of this country in which we are so proud to live. I was born in this
country and I support all that your agency does. Again, you are doing a great job!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Adela B. Jimenez
